official_title: A resolution to provide for the designation of the week of February 12 to 18, 1978, as "National Vocational Education Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of February 12-18, 1978, as "National Vocation Education Week."

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the designation of the week of February 12 to 18, 1978, as "National Vocational Education Week".
